subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fernando Torres scored twice, and Daniel Agger and David Ngog added goals Saturday as Liverpool cruised to a 4-0 win over Blackburn Rovers on an emotional occasion its Anfield stadium.
snippet: Fernando Torres scored twice, and Daniel Agger and David Ngog added goals Saturday as Liverpool cruised to a 4-0 win over Blackburn Rovers on an emotional occasion its Anfield stadium.
